attributes.action: Once the COVID-19 pandemic has passed, to hold an annual 'NHS Day'
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government or Parliament to do this because we should never take for granted the men and women who dedicate their lives to saving the lives of others.
attributes.background: Announce an annual NHS Day that will celebrate the truly remarkable men and women who serve in the NHS and who have been sacrificing and risking so much during the COVID-19 national emergency. We owe it to them to never forget the efforts which have gone into saving as many lives as possible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
